name: American Airlines First Class Airbus A321, Phoenix PHX to Los Angeles LAX
description:
Fly from Phoenix to Los Angeles on an American Airlines Airbus A321. Sat in First Class, experience all of the inflight service, takeoff, cruise and landing. 

Highlights include a takeoff over downtown PHX and a spectacular midair experience with a Korean Air A380 on parallel approach to LAX. Enjoy the video, and leave a comment if you liked it!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter: @pauls_trips

SnapChat: pauls_trips
